APRIL 2025 County of Marin EMS PTG 2
PEDIATRIC MEDICATIONS
DRUG CONCENTRATION STANDARD DOSE
Acetaminophen 160mg/5ml
15mg/kg PO
(Tylenol) (32mg/ml)
0.1mg/kg rapid IV/IO push, followed by 5ml
NS flush
6mg/2ml
Adenosine Max first dose: 6mg
(3mg/ml)
Repeat: x1 double the dose (0.2mg/kg)
Max second dose: 12mg
2.5mg/3ml NS
Albuterol 2.5mg/3ml NS
Repeat: x1
Pulseless Arrest: 5mg/kg IV/IO, followed by or
diluted in 20ml NS after 3rd shock
150mg/3ml
Max dose: 300mg
Amiodarone
(50mg/ml)
Tachycardia with poor perfusion: 5mg/kg
☎
IV/IO over 20-60 min
Bradycardia: 0.02mg/kg IV/IO
Preload: Minimum dose 0.1mg
1mg/10ml Max single dose: 0.5mg
(0.1mg/ml) Repeat: x1 in 3-5 min
Atropine
Vial: Organophosphate Poisoning: 0.05mg/kg IV/IO
0.4mg/ml Repeat: q5-10 min
Max dose: 4mg or until relief of symptoms
3-7kg: 2ml/kg IV/IO
Dextrose 10% D10%
≥8kg: 5ml/kg IV/IO
Max dose: 125ml
Diphenhydramine 1mg/kg IV/IO/IM
50mg/ml
(Benadryl) Max dose: 50mg
1mg/10ml Cardiac Arrest: 0.01mg/kg (0.1ml/kg) IV/IO
Epinephrine
(0.1mg/ml) Repeat: q3-5 min
Allergic Reaction: 0.01mg/kg IM
Repeat: x1 in 5 min
1mg/ml
Max dose: 0.6mg
Epinephrine
EpiPen Jr ® 0.15mg
EpiPen Jr ®: repeat as needed in 5 min
Upper Airway/Stridor: 5mg in 5ml via nebulizer
1mcg/kg slow IV/IO/IM/IN
100mcg/2ml Repeat: q5 min
Fentanyl
(50mcg/ml) Max dose: 3mcg/kg
For IN: divide dose evenly between nostrils

April 2025 County of Marin EMS
PTG 2
PEDIATRIC MEDICATIONS
DRUG CONCENTRATION STANDARD DOSE
0.03mg/kg IM
1mg/ml
Glucagon Repeat: x2 q15 min if no IV established
Max dose: 1mg
Ipratropium
500mcg/2.5ml Unit dose 500mcg/2.5ml Unit dose
(Atrovent)
0.5mg/kg slowly
Lidocaine 2%
20mg/ml Repeat: x1 at half initial dose (0.25mg/kg)
(preservative free)
Max dose: 40mg
Cardioversion: 0.05mg/kg slow IV/IO
Max dose: 1mg
Seizure:
IV/IO: 0.05mg/kg slowly
2mg/2ml Repeat: x2 q15 min
(1mg/ml) Max single dose: 1mg
Midazolam (Versed)
Total max dose: 5mg
5mg/ml
IM: 0.2mg/kg
Repeat: x1 in 10 min if still seizing
IN: 0.2mg/kg
Max dose: 5mg
For IN: divide dose evenly between nostrils
Pain Management: 0.1mg/kg slow IV/IO/IM
10mg/10ml
Repeat: x2 in 15 min (IV/IO), 30 min if IM
(1mg/ml)
Morphine
Burns: 0.1mg/kg IV/IO/IM in incremental doses
10mg/ml
up to max dose: 0.3mg/kg
0.1mg/kg (0.25ml/kg) IV/IO/IM/IN
Naloxone (Narcan) 2mg/2ml Repeat: q5 min
For IN: divide dose evenly between nostrils
Patients 12-18kg: 2mg ODT (1/2 tab) or slow
IV over 30 seconds
4mg ODT
Repeat: x1 in 10 min
Ondansetron (Zofran)
4mg/2ml
Patients >18kg: 4mg ODT (1 tab) or slow IV
(2mg/ml)
over 30 seconds
Repeat: x1 in 10 min
Sodium Bicarbonate 50mEq/50ml 1mEq/kg IV/IO
